description:
If you’re using all of your suspension travel, or not enough of it, it’s time to check your pressures. Keeping your shock and fork at the right pressure is key to getting the most out of your suspension. Outfitted with a digital display, Rockshox shock pump makes it easy to dial in your bike’s squish.

  • Durable aluminum construction
  • Digital display is clear and easy to read
  • Rotatable hose allows for a more natural pump stroke
  • Bleed button lets out any extra pressure
  • Works on air shocks, forks, most dropper posts, and other Schrader valves
name: RockShox Digital HP Fork/Shock Pump
